Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Family | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)

Louis Theroux - Extreme Love is a documentary series which sees Louis travelling to America where nearly one child in a hundred is diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder. In the second episode he finds out more about the illness Dementia which affects the elderly. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31254)
